long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically refresh Salesforce grid (List view) for any object.

This is specially useful for refreshing cases / task / opportunity / lead list where records get created very frequently.

Update: 
-- Refresh paused when user is doing inline editing in grid.
-- Refresh grid in every specified time by user (default is 45 seconds).
-- User have ability to PAUSE refreshing
